name: Eco Trips
description:
This is a prototype, if you think you would find a polished and more robust version useful, get in touch!

Practice reducing your environmental footprint as much as possible! 

Visit all places in your to-do list. For each destination, choose which mode of transport to use. You will need to click on each stop in the way to your destiny, and depending on wether you choose a bike, a bus or your private car, you can get there faster or slower.  But careful, don't contaminate too much and arrive inside your time limit. 

Does it sound easy? Not too much, no.
